text: Federico Granja Ricalde (17 August 1942 – 2 November 2021) was a Mexican politician. He was a member of the Institutional Revolutionary Party. He was a member of the Chamber of Deputies from 1979 to 1982, 1985 to 1988, and again from 2000 to 2003. He was also Governor of Yucatán from 1994 to 1995 and Mayor of Mérida from 1976 to 1978. Granja Ricalde died on 2 November 2021 in Mérida at the age of 79. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Mexican politicians
title: Federico Granja Ricalde
